alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jones; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bibb, north central Twiggs and Jones Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Postell, or 7 miles south of Gray, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Gray, Postell, James, Bradley, Wayside, Mountain Springs, Griswoldville, Haddock, Round Oak, Greenberry Crossroads, Clinton, Cross Keys and Arkwright. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
